original_text: And I will forsake the remnant of my heritage and give them into the hand of their enemies, and they shall become a prey and a spoil to all their enemies,
korean_text: 내가 나의 기업에서 남은 자들을 버려 그들의 원수의 손에 넘긴즉 그들이 모든 원수에게 노략거리와 겁탈거리가 되리니

sentences.original_text: And I will forsake the remnant of my heritage
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 나의 유업의 남은 자를 버리겠고

sentences.original_text: and give them into the hand of their enemies
and they shall become a prey and a spoil
